page.title: 07THE FOOTHPATH
page.content: THE FOOTPATH- RENHOLD VILLAGE TO DOG FARM CROSSES THE SHALLOW RIVER VALLEY FROM N.TO S OF BLOCKS 1 AND 2 TO THE A 428 ROAD.ON THE E. IT IS BORDERED BY A NARROW COPSE OF TREES AND ON THE W. BY LARGE FIELDS OF CEREALS AND CABBAGES. FROM A 428 IT CROSSES WELL-FENCED PASTURE LAND AND A FARM-YARD WITH STABLES AND BARNS. IT PASSES THE WATER-MILL TO A CONCRETE BRIDGE OVER THE GREAT OUSE.S.OF THE RIVER IT PASSES APRIVATE GRASS AIRFIELD AND A SMALL HANGAR.AFTER A TWISTY SECTION, THE PATH ENTERS A PLANTATION OF POPLAR TREES WHICH CONCEALS A SAND AND GRAVEL QUARRY. OUT OF THE WOOD IT CONTINUES ALMOST S.WITH PASTURELAND TO THE E. AND CEREAL AND PASTURE TO THE W. MEETING THE A603 AT DOG FARM.
